translation.en: [narrator] In the beginning, there was only the Primordial Mind.
translation.zh: ‎起初 只有原初意识存在

translation.en: From this mind sprang the whole of creation.
translation.zh: ‎所有造物都是衍生自原初意识

translation.en: The stars, the planets, life and death.
translation.zh: ‎所有造物都是衍生自原初意识 ‎星星、行星、生命与死亡

translation.en: But in time, the Mind was divided against itself.
translation.zh: ‎不过后来 原初意识发生了分裂

translation.en: Two fragments, the Radiant and the Dire, thought and action,
translation.zh: ‎产生了两个碎片 ‎圣辉与夜魇、思想与行动

translation.en: warred over creation with irreconcilable ferocity.
translation.zh:
‎这两个碎片在造物之中
‎进行了相当激烈的对决

translation.en: The Chaos of the Infinite followed.
They all sought wisdom in the shattered Primordial Mind
translation.zh: ‎都在破碎的原初意识中寻求智慧

translation.en: and power from its ineffable madness.
translation.zh: ‎并在无以名状的疯狂中寻求力量

translation.en: But in his prison in Foulfell,
the demon Terrorblade gazed into the chaos
Remake creation in his own infernal image.
translation.zh: ‎以自己的炼狱形象再造造物

translation.en: [Frühling] What the hell is he doing?
Why isn't he killing the damn thing?
translation.zh: ‎他为什么不杀了那该死的东西？

translation.en: Dishonor my kill again, you're next.
translation.zh: ‎再羞辱我杀的猎物 你就死定了

translation.en: Fucking thing killed four of mine, injured at least five more.
translation.zh:
‎这死东西杀死了我的四个手下
‎还伤了至少五个人

translation.en: They tore each other apart. It's like they all went crazy.
translation.zh:
‎它们互相残杀
‎就像是集体发疯了一样

translation.en: Like they all lost their minds and turned on one another, all at once.
translation.zh: ‎同时集体失去理智 开始攻击彼此

translation.en: Crazy wyrmlings, crazy hatchlings… I'm sure it's fine.
translation.zh:
‎发疯的雏龙、发疯的幼龙
‎应该没什么大不了的

‎-这是上古龙族挖的
‎-它睡着了

‎-因为我们还活着
‎-那就是睡着了

translation.en: Now is our chance. Now we kill the beast.
translation.zh: ‎机会来了 ‎我们要趁现在杀死那头野兽

translation.en: No. Now we pray he doesn't wake up.
translation.zh: ‎不行 我们只能祈祷它不要醒来

translation.en: And when, pray you, do we return to kill the big one?
translation.zh: ‎你打算什么时候回来杀那只大龙？

translation.en: Do you know how many living Dragon Knights
translation.zh: ‎你知道有几位还在世的龙骑士

translation.en: have ever seen a "big one" that still had fire in its guts?
translation.zh: ‎看过肚子里还有火焰的“大龙”吗？

translation.en: Or whatever they have in their guts, it varies from dragon to dragon.
translation.zh: ‎也不一定是火焰 每只龙都不太一样

translation.en: We'll ride for Dragon Hold in the morning. Get advice, find help.
translation.zh: ‎我们天亮再去龙堡 寻求建议和帮助

translation.en: But tonight, I plan to celebrate the fact that I'm still breathing.
translation.zh: ‎不过今晚 我想好好庆祝自己还活着
‎你也该这么做 尤其是你

translation.en: [Bram] All these people… Just for you.
This morning they were terrified, tonight they feel safe.
translation.zh:
‎大家今天早上还很害怕
‎晚上却得以安心

translation.en: All I'm doing is delivering their trophy.
All right. It's a little bit for me.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 少数是为我而来的

translation.en: -Yes, sir. -He was a brave son of a bitch.
You look like you're a brave son of a bitch, too.
Here. I want you to have this. Dragon fang.
translation.zh: ‎来 我想把这个送给你 这是龙牙

translation.en: I've got one just like it. See?
When you're of age, when you're ready, take yours to Dragon Hold.
translation.zh: ‎等你年纪到了 等你准备好了 ‎就带这龙牙去龙堡

translation.en: I'll slay monsters too someday. Just like father.
translation.zh: ‎我之后也要杀怪物 跟我爸一样

translation.en: [Bram] Davion leaped left, he leaped right.
Bobbing and weaving as the great beast lunged and snapped!
translation.zh:
‎一直闪躲攻击
‎那只巨兽也一直冲刺出击

translation.en: Finally, knowing it was beaten, the dragon fled under the earth!
translation.zh: ‎最后 那只龙知道自己输定了 ‎所以就躲到了地底下去

translation.en: There, alone in the darkness, he slew the beast!
translation.zh: ‎他在黑暗中独力杀死了那头野兽

translation.en: When we found him, covered in the enemy's black, stinking blood,
translation.zh:
‎我们找到他时
‎他全身沾满了敌人又脏又臭的血

translation.en: he said, "Tonight, we dine! Tonight, we drink!
translation.zh:
‎他说：“我们今晚要享用大餐
‎我们今晚要畅饮美酒

translation.en: Of course, I played a critical role.
translation.zh: ‎我当然也扮演了很重要的角色

translation.en: He'd have been dead a hundred times if I weren't there.
translation.zh: ‎要不是有我在 他早就死一百次了

translation.en: Worry not. I'll return with fresh cups for everyone.
translation.zh: ‎别担心 我再去买酒给大家喝

‎-老板 再来一轮酒
‎-不好意思

translation.en: Forgive me. I'm in my cups. I didn't see you there.
translation.zh: ‎不好意思 我喝多了 都没注意到你

translation.en: Two glasses, chilled of course, not so sharp.
translation.zh:
‎两个杯子 当然要是冰的
‎这样比较顺口

translation.en: It smells terrible. And it's warm.
It's beer. It's all we got.
translation.zh: ‎这是啤酒 我们只卖啤酒

translation.en: Wet, sour and sharp enough to cut the head off a hellbear.
translation.zh: ‎又酸又刺激 足以砍掉地狱熊的头

translation.en: -I'll pay for her Icewrack white. -Oh, uh, in that case, they're free.
translation.zh:
‎-我帮她付冰川残骸雪白的钱
‎-那就算你免费

translation.en: Wait. If I order, it's two crowns. If he orders, he pays nothing.
translation.zh: ‎等等 如果是我点的 就要两克朗 ‎如果是他点的 就不用付钱

translation.en: Well, yeah. He's Davion the fucking Dragon Knight
translation.zh: ‎没错 他可是天杀的龙骑士达维安

translation.en: But the one, the big one, you left down in that gods-empty hole!
translation.zh:
‎但是你却没有杀死
‎空荡巢穴里的那只大龙

‎-别把他捧得太过头了
‎-你喝醉了

translation.en: Tell her how you bravely ran away.
translation.zh: ‎跟她说你是如何勇于逃跑的

translation.en: If all your stories were worth a steaming sod,
translation.zh: ‎如果你的那些故事都确切属实

translation.en: you'd be killing that thing. Listen up, idiot.
translation.zh:
‎-那只龙应该早被你杀了
‎-听好了 笨蛋

translation.en: One man alone can't kill an eldwyrm, nor 10, nor 20.
translation.zh: ‎只靠一个人是杀不死上古龙族的 ‎十个人或二十个人也一样

translation.en: It would be stupid to try.
Waking that monster means death for everyone within miles of here.
translation.zh:
‎唤醒那只怪兽
‎会让方圆几公里的人全都死光

translation.en: Now, if you'll sod right off, I was talking to the… lady.
translation.zh: ‎请你离开 我在跟这位小姐讲话

translation.en: Ah! She thinks you're a coward, too.
I assume you would've preferred a dark alley or the foothills.
translation.zh: ‎我猜你应该比较喜欢暗巷或山脚

translation.en: The better to rob me. Rob you? [sighs]
translation.zh:
‎-比较适合对我行抢
‎-对你行抢？

translation.en: Locating precious things for the wealthy is more lucrative than stealing from them.
translation.zh:
‎帮有钱人找贵重之物
‎比偷有钱人的东西更有赚头
‎赛莉蒙妮的莲花 篡夺者的莲花

translation.en: I care only to make them mine now. I don't have your lotuses.
translation.zh:
‎-我只想把那些莲花变成我的
‎-莲花不在我的手上

translation.en: What I do have is a name. Travel to the Black Market in Haupstadt.
translation.zh:
‎但我知道一个名字
‎你去哈普斯达特的黑市

translation.en: Ask for Nikdo. He'll arrange the rest.
translation.zh: ‎说要找尼克多 他会安排后续事宜
‎你答应过会把莲花带来给我

translation.en: Now, the matter of my payment.
I'm not paying for a name.
Then I'll find Nikdo and tell him there's no bargain.
translation.zh: ‎那我就去找尼克多 跟他说交易取消

translation.en: But I do have other items of value.
Human women are pleasantly soft, but too easy to come by.
translation.zh:
‎人类女性虽然很柔软
‎但是太容易就能到手了
‎我不是要给你那个 是这个

translation.en: And my other future ex-wife. Huh? [laughs]
Never come down from the throne to address a peasant.
translation.zh: ‎不要为了跟贱民说话从王位下来

translation.en: Oh, I see. Skinny bastard is your boyfriend.
translation.zh: ‎我懂了 这瘦皮猴是你男朋友

translation.en: Been stepping out on me, huh?
Snogging my future ex-wife, are we?
Believe me when I tell you, I would never dare tread
translation.zh: ‎相信我 我绝对不敢去碰

translation.en: where you've set foot or anything else.
-Elf! Filthy spawn of tree rot. -[villagers gasp]
Cousin of mine wandered into one of your enclaves once.
translation.zh: ‎我有个表亲曾碰巧走进精灵小区

translation.en: Came out half-mad, minus an arm and two balls.
translation.zh: ‎他出来时已经是半个疯子 ‎还少了条手臂和两颗蛋蛋

translation.en: Elves cut him a smile ear to ear.
translation.zh: ‎精灵把他的两边嘴角都割开到耳边

translation.en: Think I'll cut you one to match it.
[Davion] This seems like the right place to drop the garbage.
translation.zh: ‎这地方好像蛮适合倒垃圾的
‎去哈普斯达特找尼克多吧 公主

translation.en: You get more interesting by the minute.
Most men would've left him to the mob. Most men would've joined it.
translation.zh: ‎大多数人会放任他被暴徒攻击 ‎大多数人还会加入战局

translation.en: Another round for all my friends!
translation.zh: ‎再帮我的所有朋友上一轮酒

translation.en: [grumbles] I'm not afraid of any dragon!
Hear me! I'm not afraid of you!
I can still smell the piss on your leg.
translation.zh: ‎我还闻得到你腿上的尿骚味

translation.en: [Terrorblade] You're the joke of the village.
We can slay that beast. You and I.
translation.zh: ‎我们可以宰了那头野兽 就你和我

translation.en: And no one ever has to know your secret terror.
translation.zh: ‎不用让别人知道你隐藏的恐惧

translation.en: Your impotence. I'll do all the work.
translation.zh: ‎你毫无实力 苦差事就交给我来

translation.en: All you have to do… is let me in.
No. Not really. I, I just…
-You don't even know my name, do you? -[Bram] Davion!
translation.zh:
‎-你连我的名字都不知道吧？
‎-达维安

translation.en: It's all right. I know yours.
translation.zh: ‎没关系 我知道你的名字

translation.en: Davion, wake up! Gods' mercy, Bram, I hear you.
translation.zh:
‎-达维安 醒醒
‎-老天啊 布拉姆 我听到了

translation.en: Searched every room for you. I woke up half the…
translation.zh:
‎我还一间一间开门找你
‎吵醒了一半的…

translation.en: It's Captain Frühling. He's gone to the foothills.
translation.zh: ‎是弗林队长 他去了山脚

translation.en: [Davion] Moron. Brainless, arrogant… He means to kill the eldwyrm.
translation.zh:
‎-愚蠢、无脑、自大
‎-他就是想要杀上古龙族

translation.en: I'm going after him. I'll try to stop him. One way or another.
translation.zh:
‎我去找他 我会尽力阻止他的
‎无论得用什么手段

‎-我跟你去
‎-不行 你要去龙堡

translation.en: Go to Dragon Hold. The Fathers need to know.
translation.zh:
‎-我跟你去
‎-不行 你要去龙堡 ‎得让所有父亲知道
‎他们得派上所有人

‎得让所有父亲知道
‎他们得派上所有人

translation.en: [Bram] Hoping I show up in Dragon Hold with a head.
translation.zh: ‎希望我去到龙堡时还保得住脑袋

translation.en: And both arms. And they'll both be mine.
translation.zh: ‎以及两条手臂 而且都是我的手臂

translation.en: Dragon Knight, we do the gods' work here.
translation.zh: ‎龙骑士 我们在这里为神做工

translation.en: You and I, we should be friends.
Friends? Frühling, what did you do?
No man is capable of… this.
translation.zh:
‎没人有能力办到… ‎-这件事
‎-乌尔德瑞克已经老了、病了

‎-这件事
‎-乌尔德瑞克已经老了、病了

translation.en: Yet even his powers at their height could not have saved him.
translation.zh: ‎但就算它在全盛时期也阻止不了死亡

translation.en: [Davion] Gods. Tell me, Dragon Knight, Davion.
translation.zh:
‎-天啊
‎-告诉我 龙骑士达维安

translation.en: If you could do what has been done,
if you had the power, wouldn't you take it?
translation.zh: ‎要是你有能力 你难道不会做吗？

translation.en: The little boy who stood frozen as his father burned alive.
translation.zh:
‎当时眼睁睁看着爸爸
‎被活活烧死的小男孩

translation.en: I was just a child. How do you--?
Childhood evaporated with your father's flesh.
translation.zh: ‎你的童年随着爸爸的身躯一起消失

translation.en: A boy made man by your despair.
I see you, trapped in your own hell of regret.
translation.zh: ‎我看见你被困在自己的悔恨当中

translation.en: What wouldn't you do to escape?
translation.zh: ‎为了逃跑 你有什么事做不出来？

translation.en: -[Davion] You know nothing. -I know this much.
translation.zh:
‎-你什么都不知道
‎-我至少知道这件事

translation.en: All you have to do is let me in.

translation.zh: ‎你要释放乌尔德瑞克的灵魂

translation.en: so he may rejoin the Thunder and take new form.
translation.zh: ‎让它能重回雷霆并以新姿态再临

translation.en: The Thunder speaks and chooses you to give it voice.
translation.zh: ‎雷霆发表了意见并选择由你当发言人

translation.en: I'll collect your soul as I collected Uldorak's.
translation.zh:
‎我会像收集乌尔德瑞克的灵魂一样
‎收集你的灵魂

translation.en: [Slyrak] Uldorak was ready for death. The madness was upon him.
translation.zh: ‎乌尔德瑞克当时准备迎接死亡 ‎它已在发狂边缘 非常软弱
‎它已在发狂边缘 非常软弱

translation.en: Count yourself fortunate I have no taste for manflesh today.
translation.zh: ‎算你走运 我今天不想吃人肉

translation.en: Fled to the hell he calls home.

translation.zh: ‎乌尔德瑞克的灵魂已经消失了

translation.en: Die in peace. I want nothing of peace, little mouse.
translation.zh:
‎-安详死去吧
‎-我不想要安详 小老鼠

translation.en: You know of the death I want.
For all the suffering you will now endure.
The best help I could offer is to let him sleep,
translation.zh:
‎我最能够帮到他的
‎就是让他好好睡一觉

translation.en: and when he wakes, understand he must make better life choices.
translation.zh:
‎等他醒来之后
‎他要知道自己得做出更好的选择

translation.en: It's not my responsibility to protect people from themselves,
translation.zh: ‎让别人不受自己所害并不是我的责任

translation.en: no matter what good and noble qualities they might possess.
translation.zh: ‎无论他们品德有多优秀和高尚

translation.en: Don't look at me that way, Marci.
You can't possibly know he would come to my aid if the tables were turned.
translation.zh:
‎你怎么能确定我们如果立场互换
‎他一定会帮我？

translation.en: I should hardly need to tell you.
Get him up, but put a cloak on him for decency's sake.
translation.zh:
‎把他扶起来
‎帮他披上斗篷吧 太难看了

translation.en: You will not be happy when you awaken, Davion the Dragon Knight.
translation.zh:
‎你醒来的时候一定会很不开心
‎龙骑士达维安
